sys_data_source.name: Lansweeper Linux Server
sys_data_source.sql_statement:
SELECT tblAssets.AssetID , tblLinuxEnclosure.SMBIOSAssetTag AS AssetTag , 'Hardware' AS Category , TsysChassisTypes.ChassisName AS ChassisType , tAssetComments.Comment AS Comments , CAST(tblAssets.AssetID AS VARCHAR) + ':' + COALESCE(RTRIM(LTRIM(tblAssets.Mac)), '') AS CorrelationID , tblAssets.NrProcessors AS CPUCount
, tmpProcessor.Manufacturer AS CpuManufacturer , tmpProcessor.CPUName AS CpuName , tmpProcessor.MaxClockSpeed AS CpuSpeedMhz , tblAssets.Processor AS CPUType , 'Lansweeper' AS DiscoverySource , tDiskDrives.TotalDiskSpace AS DiskSpaceGB -- confirm conversion , tblAssets.Firstseen AS FirstDiscovered
, TsysChassisTypes.ChassisName AS FormFactor , tblAssets.FQDN AS FQDN , 'installed' AS HardwareStatus , 'in_use' AS SubStatus , 1 AS InstallStatus , tblAssets.IPAddress AS IPAddress , tLinuxSystem.KernelRelease , tblAssets.Lastseen AS MostRecentDiscovery , tblAssets.Mac AS MACAddress , tblAssetCustom.Manufacturer AS Manufacturer , tblAssetCustom.Model AS ModelID , tblAssetCustom.Model AS ModelNumber , tblAssets.AssetName AS [Name] , tblState.Statename AS OperationalStatus , COALESCE(tsysOS.OSname, tLinuxSystem.OperatingSystem) AS OperatingSystem , CASE WHEN tLinuxSystem.ProcessorType LIKE '%x86_32%' THEN 32 WHEN tLinuxSystem.ProcessorType LIKE '%x86_64%' THEN 64 END AS OSAddressWidth
, tblAssets.Domain AS OSDomain -- , tblAssets.SP As OSServicePack -- No Mapping , tLinuxSystem.KernelVersion AS OSVersion , tblAssetCustom.PurchaseDate AS Purchased , tblAssets.Memory AS RAM_MB , tblAssetCustom.Serialnumber AS SerialNumber , tblAssets.Description AS ShortDescription , 'Computer' AS Subcategory , tblAssetCustom.Warrantydate AS WarrantyExpiration , tsysAssetTypes.AssetTypename AS SourceName FROM tblAssets LEFT OUTER JOIN tblAssetCustom ON tblAssets.AssetID = tblAssetCustom.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tsysAssetTypes ON tblAssets.Assettype = tsysAssetTypes.assettype
LEFT OUTER JOIN tblState ON tblState.State = tblAssetCustom.State LEFT OUTER JOIN tsysIPLocations On tsysIPLocations.StartIP <= tblAssets.IPNumeric AND tsysIPLocations.EndIP >= tblAssets.IPNumeric LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(Added) AS Added , MAX(Comment) AS Comment FROM tblAssetComments GROUP BY AssetId )tAssetComments ON tAssetComments.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN tblLinuxEnclosure On tblAssets.AssetID = tblLinuxEnclosure.AssetID LEFT OUTER JOIN TsysChassisTypes ON tblLinuxEnclosure.ChassisTypes = TsysChassisTypes.Chassistype LEFT OUTER JOIN tsysOS On tblAssets.OScode = tsysOS.OScode
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetId , KernelName , KernelRelease , KernelVersion , ProcessorType , OperatingSystem , OSRelease , LastChanged FROM tblLinuxSystem WHERE LastChanged = (SELECT MAX(LastChanged) FROM tblLinuxSystem it WHERE it.AssetID = tblLinuxSystem.AssetID) ) tLinuxSystem ON tblAssets.AssetID = tLinuxSystem.AssetID
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , MAX(MaxSpeed) as MaxClockSpeed , MAX(Manufacturer) as Manufacturer , MAX(Version) as CPUName FROM tblLinuxProcessors GROUP BY AssetID ) as tmpProcessor ON tblAssets.AssetID = tmpProcessor.AssetID
LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT AssetID , SUM(CAST(Size AS BIGINT)) / 1024 / 1024 AS TotalDiskSpace FROM tblLinuxHardDisks GROUP BY AssetID ) tDiskDrives ON tDiskDrives.AssetID = tblAssets.AssetID
WHERE tblAssets.Assettype = (SELECT assettype FROM tsysAssetTypes WHERE AssetTypeName = 'Linux')
